rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with traditional Chettinad motifs and a Vastu-compliant placement aligning with the plot's positive energy flow.
Spacious open-plan living area adjacent to kitchen, featuring large windows for natural light and ventilation. Vastu principles ensure the seating is oriented towards the east.
Modern open-plan kitchen integrated with living area; designed with efficient workspace and traditional stone finishes for a Chettinad aesthetic.
Cozy guest room ensuring privacy with Vastu-aligned position on the north-east corner to promote prosperity and tranquility.
Luxurious master bedroom with attached ensuite bathroom; positioned in the south-west corner as per Vastu for harmony.
Additional bedroom ensuring family privacy and balanced energy according to local norms.
Main bathroom centrally located with Vastu alignment for positive health flow.

openings.description: Large windows ensuring ample natural light and cross ventilation, compliant with local building norms.
Well-dimensioned doors to ensure ease of movement and alignment with Vastu principles.
Access point to the central courtyard, enhancing natural ventilation and traditional Chettinad ambiance.
